Hi! I'm Julia, but you can call me Juwels. I'm a Boston based full stack developer, student pilot, and freshwater fish mom.



My Work

Programmed front-end using HTML/CSS, managed hosting, domain & SEO. Integrated Instagram API to back-end for photo gallery

Programmed Solidity smart contract to issue tokens, dApp website front-end using React to allow shareholders to buy tokens, met with animator to create 3D verison of token on site

Created an SMS Chatbot to get Avaition Weather updates for US airports to as an aid for pilots to use when flight planning.
